item.title: Byju’s allegedly shuts Kerala office, forces employees to resign
item.description: Byju’s allegedly shuts Kerala office, forces employees to resign Byju’s, the world’s most valued edtech firm backed by Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg’s Chan Zuckerberg Initiative, may have shut its office in Technopark, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala and asked employees working there to resign.
